title: India, Germany decide to expand ties in clean energy, mobility sectors
description: New Delhi and Berlin are enhancing cooperation in renewable energy, urban development, agroecology, and mobility. This decision follows development policy negotiations led by India's Department for Economic Affairs and Germany's Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development. The collaboration is part of the 'Partnership for Green and Sustainable Development' established in 2022.
